For those of you having problems with Majesty.  I have tried many different ways with Windows XP and still can't get it to work.  I'm pretty sure that the same problem applies in Vista.  My work around is installing Virtual PC 2007 from Microsoft and putting Windows 98 on that.  Granted, that's a bit extreme but if you want to play the game bad enough then it's worth a shot.

THERE IS NO VIRUS ON THIS DOWNLOAD AND ENJOY IT

For people having crashing problems:

I was as well, running majx.exe.

Using a solution from another site, I found that if you deleted binkw32.dll, and ran from majesty.exe, it will run fine.

Also, a problem people might be running into on newer displays/video cards is an insanely fast scroll. If you've run into that problem, try this:

1. Open "run," type "regedit," run.

2. Select HKEY_CURRENT_USER

3. Select Software

4. Select Cyberlore, click on the Majesty folder

5. Double click "Scrollspeed," set value to something lower than 20 (6 works well) hexidecimal.

6. Repeat steps 4 and 5 for the "Majesty Expansion" folder.


Hope that helps people. Thanks for the file.
